metadata.description:
They were the best...they killed the rest.

Five deadly assassins are recruited into a game of cat and mouse by their former sensei, the mysterious Jonin! But what does the Jonin want from them, and what do they gain out of helping him? 

Thrillig writer B. Clay Moore (SAVAGE, Hawaiian Dick) and exceptional artist Fernando Dagnino (Superman, Suicide Squad) come together for  a non-stop thrill ride as the deadliest superspies on the planet compete to claim the ultimate prize!
metadata.name: Killers
